description:
A great little local hike for those that want to get away from the often present crowds around Thetis Lake.

Start at the Thetis Lake parking lot and head North along the East side of Thetis Lake to jct. with Seaborn Trail; North onto Seaborn Trail to jct. with McKenzie Trail; West on McKenzie trail to jct. with old forest road; North on old road to Stewart Mountain Trail; North-West to  summit trail. ~ 7 km each way.
directions: Thetis lake Regional Park North off Hwy #1 ~ 10 miles from Victoria.
title: Thetis Lake to Scafe Hill
